crisis: 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline (US): Call or text 988 - Available 24/7
Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741 - Free, 24/7 support
International Association for Suicide Prevention: Find local help at befrienders.org
mental_health: Mental Health America: Visit mhanational.org for resources and support
Psychology Today: Find therapists at psychologytoday.com
emergency: Emergency Services: Call 911 (US) or your local emergency number immediately
If you are in immediate danger, please contact emergency services right now
Go to your nearest emergency room if you feel unsafe
international: Befrienders Worldwide: befrienders.org - Find local crisis support
International Association for Suicide Prevention: iasp.info/resources/Crisis_Centres
lgbtq: The Trevor Project: 1-866-488-7386 - LGBTQ+ crisis support
veterans: Veterans Crisis Line: Call 988 then press 1, or text 838255
Veterans Affairs: Visit va.gov for mental health resources
